text: {"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"3","subject":"ITEM 3: orchestrator.py _safe_attr モジュールレベル昇格 (~15行削減)","description":"build_manuscript_request()内のローカルget_attr()を_safe_attr()としてモジュールレベル(L44付近)に移動。build_manuscript_request()内の7箇所とbuild_ppv_detail_request()のyudoアクセス5行を_safe_attr()呼び出しに置換。","assignedBy":"be-worker","timestamp":"2026-02-09T10:26:49.863Z"}
